response.original_title: California Corporate: Resolving McAfee "Error 12152" and NPU Handshake Failures
response.overview: McAfee California Helpline: 1-855-508-8955 Technical Root Cause Analysis: In California’s 2026 tech corridors, Error 12152 (or 7305) is frequently tied to Neural Processing Unit (NPU) Desync. McAfee’s 2026 AI-scanning engine requires a real-time handshake with the local AI hardware. If the WinInet API or local DCOM settings are misconfigured, the software cannot verify the update server's authenticity, leading to a "Download Failed" state and an exposed system. Advanced Restoration Protocols: WinHTTP Proxy Reset: Open an elevated CMD and run netsh winhttp reset proxy to clear malicious routing. Install Helper Flush: Use the 2026 McAfee Software Install Helper to purge the local temp cache and re-initialize the NPU communication bridge. WMI Repository Salvage: Rebuild the Windows Management Instrumentation database to allow the OS to properly recognize the McAfee service.
response.tagline: California Corporate: Resolving McAfee "Error 12152" and NPU Handshake Failures
response.title: California Corporate: Resolving McAfee "Error 12152" and NPU Handshake Failures
